page.title: 19CARNIVALS
page.content: {RUYTON CARNIVAL (contd)} This year the Queen is to be Miss Lisa Kirkham with Miss Miranda Brown and Miss Mary Burgess as attendants. The stalls and sideshows on the field are run by local organisations and charities, including the Playgroup, Mothers and Toddlers, Scouts, Church, Women's Institute, Ladies Club and The Diabetics Association, with all proceeds going to their own funds. The entertainment is organised by the committee and includes a Travelling Fair, A Tug of War competition organised by Mr. R. Macken, and this year a Pantomime Horse Race is being held with competitors making their own costumes. Prizes are for the best costume and also the race winner. A grand draw is held and tickets are on sale a month beforehand. The proceeds from this cover the expenses
